attributes.title: Captain of the Archers

sections.Biography:
===Background===
The Captain of the Archers is a man sworn to [[House Lannister]].
===[[Season 2]]===
[[File:Joffrey terrified 2x09.jpg|thumb|left|Joffrey, Sandor Clegane, and the Captain of the Archers stand on the walls of the Red Keep in "[[Blackwater]]".]]
He commands the archers at the [[Mud Gate]] during the [[Battle of the Blackwater]], relaying orders from [[Tyrion Lannister]]. He begins volley firing when the forces of King [[Stannis Baratheon]] reach the shores of [[Blackwater Bay]]. [[Sandor Clegane]] threatens the Captain to ensure that his flaming arrows are kept away from him when he leads a sally through the gate. After Sandor retreats the Captain urges his men to fire more quickly. The battle is eventually won when a host of Lannister-Tyrell reinforcements arrive.<ref>"[[Blackwater (episode)|Blackwater]]"</ref>
